explanation: [0-0] A person standing on a pier is raising a hand, preparing to throw something into the water. There are white railings beside the pier, several boats and two protruding wooden pillars on the water. The sky is partly cloudy, and land can be seen in the distance. There is a white comment box in the middle of the screen, containing an avatar, name, and comment.
[0-3] The person throws up an apple, catches it in their mouth, takes a bite, and then runs from the far end of the pier to the other with the apple.

[3-7] Then the person jumps onto the protruding wooden pillar in the water. After standing firmly, they make a fist with one hand. The white subtitles "WOOOAH", "FIRST", "TRYYY", "LETS", "GOOOOO" appear in sequence.
